120477.en:
Patriarch Orstov says that soon a liberator will appear to save this world. All we can do is to pray that
the liberator will appear as soon as possible.

120478.en:
The leader of the Nadraga Order is Patriarch Orstov. Our life is not easy at the moment, but I am sure that one
day Orstov will bring back the world to a better place.

120479.en:
The area outside of town from here is a dangerous place called the Valley of Fire. If you don't have any use for
it, don't go there. The cultists often go to Southwest Tower, but I don't know what they're doing there.

120480.en:
Whoa! What the hell are you doing? What were Dalibor and the others doing out there? How dare you let such a
suspicious person through! You have a letter of introduction from Priestess Estella? Hmm. Then there should be no
problem. This is Holy City Ejarna, the largest town in the Fire Realm and home to the sacred Great Temple of the
Order of Nadraga. If you want to see Estella, go to the Great Temple. Turn right at the plaza ahead and go
straight ahead.

120481.en:
This is Holy City Ejarna, the largest city in the Fire Realm and home to the sacred Great Temple of the Order of
Nadraga. If you want to see Estella, go to the Great Temple. Turn right at the plaza ahead and go straight ahead.
120481.ja:

120482.en:
I've been ordered by the Patriarch to guard this place, but I honestly don't know why. The door doesn't open at
all, and I don't see anything that looks like a keyhole. It doesn't seem like an important place.
120482.ja:

120483.en:
The priests of the Nadraga cult should release us from the torment of the flames. Until then, we will be
patient.

120484.en:
Look at this. A while ago, there used to be water flowing in this river. But now, instead of water, there are
flames. We're going to get burned to a crisp. I hope the Nadraga cult finds a liberator soon. Then this town will be
saved.

120485.en: Oh, you're not a dragon, are you?<yesno><break>

120486.en:
I've heard about it, but I've never seen it before. I've heard about them, but I've never seen one before. It's
quite an interesting figure, isn't it?

120487.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Huh? You don't look like me from any
angle. I'm sure you're from a
different race!

120488.en:
Estella is the priestess of the Nadraga Order, and along with Tobias, she is the one who is most active in
the Order. Both of them travel around a lot, so they are rarely at Great Temple.

120489.en:
I don't know what happened, but lately I've been seeing a lot of non-dragon people like you. Well, it doesn't
matter. I don't care how many non- liberators come here.

120490.en:
Suddenly, a priest from a different races appeared and asked me to rent a place. He said he was sent by
Allmighty Alltrades, but I've never heard of a god with that name. Well, I'll at least lend him the place.

120491.en:
Look to the north from here. In the back is the Great Temple of the Nadraga Order. Patriarch Orstov,
Estella, Tobias, and other dignitaries of the Order live there.

120492.en:
I wonder when this liberator you speak of, Patriarch Orstov, will appear and save us. At least while I'm still
alive to take care of him.

120493.en:
No matter what world you find yourself in, Travel Concierge will never harm you or your adventurers! Our safety is
guaranteed by the World Association of Innkeepers, so please do not hesitate to use us!

120494.en:
Allmighty Alltrades sees everything. If anyone wants to change their vocation, even if it is in a different
world, let them come to us.

120495.en:
Oh, no. Are you perhaps from a different race than the dragons? I've seen you around a lot lately. Since
it's your first time here, I'll tell you a good thing. If you go up this hill and down the hill a little
further on your left, you'll come to a place where there are many stores. At the Item Shop, they sell a medicine
called Safe Passage Mist, which can only be made by the dragon tribe. I hear that travelers come here to buy
it.

120496.en:
The town is a bit complicated, so even residents sometimes get lost. So I'll tell you a good thing. If you go up
this hill and down the hill a little further on your left, you can get to a place where there are many stores. The
Item Shop sells a medicine called Safe Passage Mist, which can only be made by the Dragon Tribe. I hear that
travelers come here to buy it.
120496.ja:

120497.en:
Ugh. It's so hot today, too. I feel like I'm melting. My mom says it wasn't this hot before I was born, but
I can't believe it.

120498.en:
Who are you? Eh? You're from another world? Hmm, you're amazing, aren't you? Well then, I'll tell you a secret
I know just for you. If you fall through this hole. I can go to a place where there are many stores.
120498.ja:
ã€Œã‚ãªãŸã€€ã ãã‚Œï¼Ÿ ã€€ãˆã£ã€‚ã‚ˆãã®ä¸–ç•Œã‹ã‚‰æ¥ãŸã®ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãµãƒ¼ã‚“ã€€ã™ã”ã„ã‚“ã ã­ã€‚

120499.en:
I'll tell you a secret that I know only from you, a stranger. If you fall through this hole. I can go to a place
where there are many stores.

120500.en:
This is Holy City Ejarna, the largest city in the Fire Realm and home to the sacred Great Temple of the Nadraga
cult.

120501.en:
I am very sorry, I did not know that you are acquainted with Estella! Please come inside the Great Temple!
The assembly hall is located at the far end of the first floor.

120502.en:
I am very sorry, I did not know that you are acquainted with Estella! Please feel free to enter the Great
Temple!

120503.en:
Estella has gone outside, but I wonder
if she will be all right on her own. I
should have asked to be her escort.

120504.en:
It seems that Estella has been to Matil Village. It's a defunct village located on the west side of Ejarna,
heading northwest out of the entrance/exit. What was she doing there?

120505.en:
This is <pc>. If you are
Estella, you have not returned to the
Great Temple yet.

120507.en:
Estella and Tobias have just returned.
Both of them rushed toward the Great
Temple in a panic.

120508.en:
This is . I have a message from Estella. She wants you to come to the Patriarch's room on the
second floor of the Great Temple immediately. Yes, I have given you the message!

120509.en:
Did you hear? At long last, the Liberator, the savior of the world, is upon us. There is a light in the
world. The day will come when we can escape the torment of the flames.

120510.en:
Patriarch Orstov just sent word to everyone in town. The liberator we've been waiting for has finally appeared
in the Fire Realm. Apparently, his name is !

120511.en:
I guess Estella and Tobias rushed to the Great Temple to let us know that the liberator had appeared. However,
there was no one else accompanying them. I wonder what kind of person the liberator is.

120512.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>It seems that the liberator has
finally shown up. We can finally be
saved from this hard life.

120513.en:
If only the liberator would connect all the realms and make this flaming shithole of a realm a better place to
live. We've got to get the liberator to do something about it before we're all burned to a crisp!

120514.en:
I heard that the liberator's name is , but I was not told what kind of person he is. I guess he is a
nice guy with a strong physique and a kind smile!
120514.ja:
ã€Œè§£æ”¾è€…ã•ã¾ã®ãŠåå‰ã¯ã€€ã¨ ã€€ãŠã£ã—ã‚ƒã‚‹ã‚‰ã—ã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã© ã€€ã©ã‚“ãªäººãªã®ã‹ã€€æ•™ãˆã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆãªã‹ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã€‚

120515.en:
It is rumored that Estella was the first to find the liberator. Estella is not only beautiful, but also an
excellent priestess, isn't she? I'm really envious.

120516.en:
The appearance of liberator may have something to do with the fact that many non-dragon people are coming from
other worlds. I just thought so, but I have no proof. Anyway, that's what I think.
120516.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆãã®ä¸–ç•Œã‹ã‚‰ã€€ç«œæ—ã˜ã‚ƒãªã„ãƒ¤ãƒ„ãŒ ã€€ãŸãã•ã‚“ã€€æ¥ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ãŸã“ã¨ã¨ ã€€è§£æ”¾è€…ãŒç¾ã‚ŒãŸã“ã¨ã¯ã€€é–¢ä¿‚ãŒã‚ã‚Šãã†ã ãªã€‚

120517.en:
Hey, listen up! The priest of the Nadraga cult has finally found the liberator. The priest didn't tell us
what kind of person the liberator is, but anyway, this will save us!

120518.en:
This is Estella's friend . Holy City Ejarna is currently talking about the arrival of
the liberator!

120519.en:
It is always rumored that a liberator has appeared. I wonder when he will save us. I hope they can do something
while I'm still alive to take care of her.
120519.ja:
ã€Œè§£æ”¾è€…ã®äººãŒã€€ç¾ã‚ŒãŸã£ã¦ ã€€ã‚‚ã£ã±ã‚‰ã®ã‚¦ãƒ¯ã‚µãªã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã•ã€‚ ã€€ã„ã¤ã€€ç§ãŸã¡ã‚’æ•‘ã£ã¦ãã ã•ã‚‹ã®ã‹ã­ãˆã€‚
ã€Œã›ã‚ã¦ã€€ç§ãŒç”Ÿãã¦ã€€ã“ã®å­ã®é¢å€’ã‚’ ã€€è¦‹ã‚‰ã‚Œã‚‹ã†ã¡ã«ã¯ã€€ãªã‚“ã¨ã‹ã—ã¦ã»ã—ã„ã‚ã€‚

120520.en:
I heard that the liberator has finally appeared to save us. But how will they save us? It's impossible to extinguish
a burning flame, isn't it?

120521.en:
Everyone is excited about the
appearance of a liberator, but what
does he or she do?

120522.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I would like to meet liberator. I
wonder if I can meet him at Great
Temple.

122829.en:
Estella seems to have gone to Matil Village. Come to think of it, there is a volcano further northwest of Matil
Village where Flamia is said to live. Perhaps that is where she is headed?

122830.en:
Estella is always off somewhere saving the Dragon People and is rarely in Ejarna. I remember you said that there
is a path to the Ice Realm in the tower southwest of Ejarna. I think that is where he is going now.

125152.en:
No matter how hard I push or pull, the
door won't open. It seems to be closed
by some mysterious force.

126895.en:
I see that you are . You seem to be quite a skilled fighter with many battles under your belt.
Hmmm. You're looking at me as if you're asking me how I know your name. I'm just a bit of a know-it-all. I am
Ignorant Guru Izola, illuminating the path of the lost, showing them where to go, and guiding them to a righteous
future. Now, you may not realize it yet, but I see the power that lies within you to take your chance at
victory. If you overcome the trials that I will put you through, I will awaken that power and guide you to a
new skill. I ask you, . Do you wish to become stronger, no matter what obstacles stand in your
way?
126895.ja:

126896.en:
Good answer, the trial is quite clear. Kill <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and bring back the proof. <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> appears
rarely as a reincarnation of Wyrtoise in the Red Hot Desert of the Fire Realm. I have one piece of advice for
you. The monster gets angry and runs away. Remember that. As I said before, <%sev_que_name0> is quite a formidable
foe. Be ready for a fight. Let's go.
126896.ja:

126897.en:
Good answer. But you seem to be full of other requests. You should take care of them first, and then come and
challenge me.
126897.ja:

126898.en:
I see that you are more cautious than you appear to be. But fate will bring you back to me again. As long as you
wish to become stronger.
126898.ja:
ã€Œãªã‚‹ã»ã©ã€€ã‚­ãƒŸã¯ã€€è¦‹ã‹ã‘ã«ã‚ˆã‚‰ãš ã€€æ…é‡ãªæ€§åˆ†ã®ã‚ˆã†ã ã€‚

126899.en: True, the red flame is burning.

126900.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>What's up <pc>? Defeat
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and bring back the
proof.<open_irai><bw_break>

126901.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><close_irai>As I said before, <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is
quite a formidable opponent. Be ready
for a fight. Let's go.

126902.en:
Phew . From the look on your face, it seems that you have successfully defeated <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
and brought back the Warranty.

126903.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>What's got you down? Show me the proof
that you hold in your hand.

126904.en:
It is indeed the Dragon Mustache, the precious beard that grows only once in a lifetime of the <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> who
has lived forever. Defeating <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>. That in itself is not the essence of the task. Don't
look so sceptical. You brought back the Dragon Mustache. In other words, you have a once-in-a-lifetime
opportunity. I tested your luck. Trial passed . You have the power to take a chance. Let's start
guiding you to awaken your sleeping power. Light the Dragon Mustache on the fire in the center of the room.

126905.en:
Would you like to show Izola the
Dragon Mustache?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

126907.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Trial passed <pc>. You have
the power to take a chance, just as I
thought you did.<open_irai><bw_break>

126908.en:
Now let us begin to guide you to awaken the power that lies dormant in you. Light the Dragon Mustache on the
fire in the center of the room.

126909.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Hmmm. Fantastic, isn't it? Stare at
the flame and breathe quietly. Close
your eyes.

126910.en:
Do you see the flickering flame in the darkness? It is a beacon that guides you, a beacon that traces the memories
of your battles. Yes, the power that lies within you has already been nurtured in the battles you have
fought. The skill to turn a pinch into an opportunity in the midst of battle.

126911.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><se_nots KQ_111_1 1>YOU should be able to touch it now.
Reach out and grab it!

126912.en:
You feel it, don't you? You are not the you that you were before. Your power has already been
awakened.

126913.en:
It is the spirit that rules the body. It is always changing like a wave. When the wavelength of the spirit
rises the most during the battle, the technique will naturally flicker. That is the chance skill for a reversal.
There are many battles awaiting you on your path. Hopefully, you will not stray from the right path.

126914.en:
True, the red flame is burning, would
you like to put the Dragon Mustache in
the flame?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

126915.en:
<pc> threw Dragon Mustache
into the flames!<bw_break>

126916.en:
The flames flared blue and a strange
aroma filled the air!

126917.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Phew. <pc> Six chance skills
seem to have awakened in you.
Explanation of each skill?<yesno><break>

126918.en:
Dragon Soul deals heavy damage to the target enemy and weakens the enemy's wind resistance. Pearly Gates deals
heavy damage to the target enemy and its surroundings, weakening the enemy's resistance to lightning.
Reverse Enlightenment shortens the time it takes to chant your spells and causes your spells to run out of
control for a short while. Star of Charity heals a large portion of the HP of all allies around him. Chaos
Circle increases the damage dealt to enemies above the formation. Scape Guard automatically whips nearby
allies for 30 seconds and reduces damage taken by enemies. Each move has a charge time. You can check the
charge time of each move from the ''Strength'' menu of the main command.

126919.en:
It is the spirit that rules the human body. It has waves. When the wavelength of the wave rises the most
in the battle, the chance skill will inspire itself. Many battles await you on your path. The enemies you face
will also become more powerful.

126920.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>Use your chance skill to get through
the coming battles! Hopefully, you
will never stray from the right path.

127403.en:
Fantastic, isn't it? But you've already mastered the art of taking chances. Then I'll give you this
instead. A reward for overcoming my trial.

127404.en:
<se_nots KQ_111_1 0>The images of new techniques abound in
<pc>!

127996.en:
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> appears rarely as a reincarnation of Wyrtoise in the Red Hot Desert of the Fire Realm. In case
you have not forgotten, the monster runs away when angry. Be careful not to make him angry.

128889.en:
It is still too early for you to visit here. But you will be guided by fate and visit me again. If you wish to
become stronger.
128889.ja:
ã€Œãµãµã£ã€‚ã‚­ãƒŸãŒã€€ã“ã“ã‚’è¨ªã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã¯ ã€€ã¾ã ã€€æ™‚ãŒæ—©ã‹ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ã ã€‚
ã€Œã ãŒã€€ã‚­ãƒŸã¯ã€€å®¿å‘½ã«å°ã‹ã‚Œ ã€€å†ã³ã€€ã‚ªãƒ¬ã®ã‚‚ã¨ã‚’è¨ªã‚Œã‚‹ã ã‚ã†ã€‚ ã€€ã‚­ãƒŸãŒã€€ã‚ˆã‚Šå¼·ããªã‚ŠãŸã„ã¨ã€€é¡˜ã†ãªã‚‰ã°ã€‚

128890.en:
A trial is never easy. You will not get a chance with half-hearted determination. But if you want to be
strong, go for it.

128944.en:
I see that you have been through many battles and are quite skilled. But it's still too early to visit here.
Hmm. If you wish to become more powerful. You should come here after you reach level 90 or above.

130656.en:
With the advent of the liberator, this world is beginning to see the light. The day will come when we can escape
from the torment of the flames.

130657.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The liberator named <pc> will
save us. Until then, let's be patient!

130658.en:
I am curious as to the identity of the liberator. The Order won't tell me anything but his name. I don't think
we have to hide it.

130659.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I don't know who the liberator is, but
please save us from this hard life.

130660.en:
The Priest of the Nadraga Order didn't tell us what kind of person the Liberator is, but anyway, this will
save us!

130661.en:
It seems that the liberator has gone to the Ice Realm. It seems that its mission is to connect the five
separate realms. When all the realms are connected, we will be saved!

131227.en:
Wow! Who the hell is that?How dare you come out of nowhere from inside the door! Oh? Oh, it's the liberator,
isn't it?When did you get inside? How dare you! This door leads to such an amazing place. I finally understood
why I was ordered to protect this place! I see. The Patriarch must have given me this important mission in
anticipation of me. From now on, I will guard it well!

131228.en:
Ha! Good evening, liberator. Feel free
to go through the door.

131229.en:
It seems that it cannot be opened from
this side, so let's open it from the
Hall of Invitation.

131640.en:
Dear customers, have you got enough letter paper?We, Paper Shop, have come from Astoltia to help you! Please use
our letter paper for your letters to your loved ones in Nadragand! See you soon!

131641.en:
Thank you very much! By the way, you
have a visitor. I know this is sudden,
but could you do me a favor?<yesno><break>

131642.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Too bad. We look forward to seeing you
again!

131643.en:
Wow, I'm so happy! I'd like to ask you a favor about a new letterhead we're planning to launch here at Post
Office. I wonder if our customers know about it? As a matter of fact, at Fire Realm, we only write to each other on
special occasions. The hot winds and the hot gases can easily destroy letters, so they don't seem to be in
the habit of using letters in their daily lives. Therefore, Fire Realm would like to make a very sturdy and
durable letter paper for daily use! We are looking forward to your kindness and cooperation. I am not sure if I
can get it from the ''Ash Horn'', which can be found in the Valley of Fire, west of Holy City Ejarna, and is very
sturdy. However, there is no way I can defeat it with my own strength. If I have <%nev_que_t_num0> Ash Horns, I
can make a new letter board for the Fire Realm! Please help me!
131643.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚ã€€ã†ã‚Œã—ã„ã£ï¼ã€€ãŠé¡˜ã„ã¨ã„ã†ã®ã¯ ã€€ã“ã‚Œã‹ã‚‰ã€€ã“ã®éƒµä¾¿å±€ã§å£²ã‚Šå‡ºãã†ã¨æ€ã£ã¦ã‚‹ ã€€æ–°ã—ã„ä¾¿ã›ã‚“ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®ã“ã¨ãªã‚“ã§ã™ã€‚

131644.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Really? I'm so happy! I'm so happy!
Then, I'll be waiting for it with
pleasure!

131645.en:
Really? I did it! What is it? Are you sure you're not taking on too many jobs? That's no good! You're too busy.
I'll be waiting for you, so don't worry! Please come back when you are free!

131646.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm, too bad. Please come back if you
change your mind!

131647.en:
Thank you very much! And a customer. Please also, please, please take care of the Ash horn that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
is dropping.

131648.en:
Would you like to give Paper Shop
Mikage a Bundle of Ash Horns?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

131649.en:
<pc> gave Paper Shop Mikage a
Bundle of Ash Horns!

131650.en:
Ah, you have a visitor! Did you bring
what I asked for by any chance?

131651.en:
Well then, I guess I'll have to buy
some letter paper. Let's see...<bw_break>

131652.en:
Wow, this is Ash horn. What a hard touch you won't find in Astoltia. I'm sorry. I was just swooning at the
wonderful feeling. Well then, I'll get started on the letter paper!

131653.en:
Phew! It's amazing! It's a masterpiece! Here you go, Holy City Ejarna's limited edition local
stationery!

131678.en:
The letter paper is very sturdy, so it will not be affected by hot winds! I think you can use it easily in your
daily life. We hope that this custom will take root in Fire Realm as well. We would be very happy if such a
custom takes root in the Fire Realm! We will start selling Dragon City Paper exclusively at the Post Office
as soon as possible! Then, we are looking forward to seeing you again.

131746.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I need a number to make up the new
letterhead, so please send me a batch
of 10 Ash horns!

132476.en:
Now that the Hall of Invitation investigation is over, we should report to Clauge, who is waiting for
us at the Eternal Ice Field.

132477.en:
Wow! Who the hell is that?How dare you come out of nowhere from inside the door! Oh? Oh, it's the liberator,
isn't it?When did you get inside? How dare you! This door leads to such an amazing place. I finally understood
why I was ordered to protect this place! I see. The Patriarch must have given me this important mission in
anticipation of me. From now on, I will guard it well!

132478.en:
Ha! Good evening, liberator. Feel free
to go through the door.

137082.en:
It seems that the liberator has connected the Fire Realm and the Ice Realm, and now it has gone to the Dark
Realm. When all the realms are connected, we will be saved. I can't wait for that day!

143054.en:
This is . Estella is about to leave for the Dark Realm. If you need anything from Estella, she
has her own room on the second floor of the Great Temple, on the west side. You already know that, don't you? Ha-
ha-ha.

143055.en:
This is Estella's friend
<pc>. Please feel free to
enter the Great Temple!

143602.en:
<pc> searched for pot. But
nothing was found.

143603.en:
Do you know Estella? She's not only brilliant, she's also very fair- skinned and beautiful. She is my dream
woman. I heard a rumor that Estella's secret to her beauty is that she puts a special serum on her skin. I was so
impressed by her tireless efforts that I decided to do my own research in order to follow in Estella's
footsteps. It turns out that Estella used to collect Cool Zucchini from <%sev_que_name0> in the Valley of
Fire. I'm guessing that's what the serum is made of, but I can't even get it myself. So I was wondering if you
could do me a favor and get me some Cool Zucchini?
143603.ja:

143606.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I see. Then I have no choice, but I
don't know what to do.

143607.en:
Cool Zucchini, as the name implies, is cold, so it tightens pores, which is good for the skin. It is said that the
monster <%sev_que_name0> in Valley of Fire will drop it off, so if you could get it for me, that would be great.

143608.en:
Cool Zucchini must be indispensable to
make the serum, so I would appreciate
it very much.

143609.en:
Oh my <pc>. I was wondering
if you could possibly fetch me a Cool
Zucchini?<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><break><case_cancel><break><case_end>

143610.en:
I see. If you could fetch it for me,
please give it to me. Please, I'd
appreciate it.

143611.en:
Thank you! Actually, I also collected a variety of herbs that are good for the skin! If you mix them
together, I'm sure it will give you beautiful skin, Mashimashi! I'll try to make a serum with this.

143612.en:
Ta-da! Ioma's special Creeper Gel is ready! It's a little sticky, but I hear sticky things are good for you,
so let's get started!

143613.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Oh, my God! It's so smooth, I can't
believe it! And it's so chewy! It's
amazing!<bw_break>

143614.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>But it's kind of stinky! What is this
smell? It's so stinky!

143616.en:
Ioma took a pick from under her desk
and mixed Cool Zucchini with herbs,
mixing them together as she went!<se Joutyu_SE 46>

143617.en: Ioma rubbed Creeper Gel into her skin.

143618.en:
Ioma rushed to wash off the Creeper
Gel she had rubbed into her skin.<se Joutyu_SE 35>

143620.en:
I'm sorry, but would you mind throwing this serum into the food scraps pot on the left as you exit the
house?

143621.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I'll do something about this smell
that's spreading through the house.

143622.en:
This seems to be the pot Ioma was
referring to. do you want to pour
Creeper Gel down the drain?<yesno><close>

143623.en:
<pc> poured Creeper Gel into
the pot.<se Joutyu_SE 85>

143624.en:
Something about the pot started
rattling!

143625.en:
The pot was overflowing with plants!
Let's go back to Ioma and report.

143626.en:
Oh my <pc>. Did you get rid
of the gel in the example?<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><break><case_cancel><break><case_end>

143627.en:
I see, the pot for food scraps to dispose of the Creeper Gel is on the left as you exit the house, so please,
please, please help me.

143628.en:
<pc> told Ioma that plants
had overflowed from the pot.

143630.en:
Oh my . I'm still working on the gel thing. It's quite difficult, isn't it? But one day I
will succeed in this research and make this Holy City Ejarna full of green plants! By the way, I heard that the
Cool Zucchini that Estella was collecting was used to heal people with burns. You are a very kind
person, after all. I admire you even more.

143642.en:
What? Could it be that the gel had such a special effect? Could it be that the Cool Zucchini combined with
the herbs had a good chemistry? But if that's the case, it would be very valuable in the Fire Realm, where
plants don't grow well. I'm going to find out more about Creeper Gel and spread the word about it to everyone
in the town. If I can grow various plants with it, one day there might be a green landscape in this Holy City
Ejarna. I couldn't become like you, Estella, but thanks to you, I have gained an unexpected by-product. Thank
you very much!

I'm sorry, but would you mind disposing of this serum in the garbage pot to the left as you exit

146642.en:
This is liberator. It seems that there is a complication in the Water Realm. Please go to Estella's room and talk
to her first. You are on the second floor of the Great Temple!

Hmm? I thought Nadaia had warned me not to let liberators into town... but, oh well, I'll grab him and bring
him before Nadaia and take credit for it!

146647.en:
<icon_exc>Ugh! Damn! At a time like this, I'll
let you off the hook for today.

146649.en:
You and the Order have diverged.However, Orstov has ordered us not to harm you. To avoid
unnecessary conflict, we cannot allow you to enter the temple. Please leave us. By the way, one of the followers
of the Nadraga Order, I think he is a servant of Estella, has been visiting the inn recently.

146650.en:
It seems that the liberator has connected the Dark Realm and now it has gone to the Water Realm. When all
the realms are connected, we will be saved. I can't wait for that day!

147156.en:
<color_yellow>Receive the master orb
from the Travel Concierge in each
town, etc!

147158.en:
Hmmm... I'm at a loss. I wish there was someone somewhere who could help me with the investigation. I'm looking
for someone who is good enough to fight with any monster, true, honest, and diligent. Cool to look at, smart
to talk to.

147159.en:
Mmmm you haha! You're a skilled adventurer, no matter how you look at it. And there's a certain air of
seriousness about you. My name is Mofteka, and I have been assigned to the Nadraga cult's research department
to investigate the ecology of monsters in Nadragand! When it comes to investigating monsters, combat is a
must. However, as you can see, I'm not suited for fighting, no matter how I look at it. I barely passed the
entrance exam for the Order. That's why I was looking for someone who could help me with my mission here.

147160.en:
But, I'm not sure! If you want to help us, we need master class adventurers who can handle master orbs. We would
appreciate it if you could come back when you can handle master orbs!

147161.en:
I'm an adventurer, and I've got a flash of inspiration! I was wondering if you would be willing to help us
investigate the monster?

147162.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Ugh, I'm so sorry. Whenever you feel
like it, please give me a call!

147163.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you! Your name is <pc>.
Please receive this first.

147164.en:
The survey is a simple task of selecting an area in the binder and defeating a specified number of
monsters inhabiting the area. I don't know how it works, but strangely enough, when you defeat a monster, the
information is recorded in the binder's memory area. So, when you finish defeating the monsters, please
bring the binder to me. I will collect the information and send it to the headquarters. It's really a wonder,
isn't it? Is this the mystery of Master Nadraga? Of course, I will prepare the reward for you! Good day
to you, sir.

entire area was completed!<me 61>

147167.en:
<turn_pc><pc> Hello! I would like to
check Realm Survey Binder for you.

147168.en:
However, it seems that the item bag is too full to give out the reward. Please make two empty bags and come
back again!

147169.en:
The rewards will be vocation experience, master experience, and gold, but may I give them to you in
your current vocation?

147170.en:
Since I have already reached the maximum experience value for my location, may I give you my reward,
which will be only master experience and gold?

147171.en:
Since both location experience and master experience have reached their maximums, may I give you the reward,
which will only be gold?

147172.en:

147173.en:

147174.en:

I can't receive anything because my location experience, master experience, and gold have all reached
their limits, is that OK?

147177.en:
The reward will be a training stamp,
master experience, and gold.<yesno><case 1><close><case 2><break><case_cancel><break>

147178.en:
Since my training stamps have reached their limit, I will only receive master experience and gold, but may I
give you my reward?

147179.en:
Since I have reached the maximum amount of training stamps and master experience, may I give you the reward,
which is only gold?

147180.en:
Since I have reached the maximum amount of training stamps and gold in my possession, may I give you my

Since I have reached my master experience limit, may I give you my rewards, which will be only training
stamps and gold?

147182.en:

147183.en:

147184.en:
I can't receive anything because my

147185.en:
Oh, I understand! Please come again
when <pc> is convenient!

147186.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr><pc> Thank you! Please
continue to cooperate with Nadragand's
MONSTER survey!

147187.en:
And what a surprise! With this report, <%sEV_TB_CONT_NM> all areas surveyed are complete. Thank you very much!
That's amazing! This is a special thank you from me. Please accept it!

147189.en:
With the help of , information on monsters inhabiting the territory has been recorded at
headquarters, and Nadragand's research is progressing smoothly. However, information must always be fresh! I
will keep <%sEV_TB_CONT_NM> ready to investigate anytime and any number of times, so please come back again!

<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>Hmmm... I'm at a loss. I wish there
was someone somewhere who could help
me with the research.

opens the Realm Survey Binder. He is not taking any requests at this time, so he should meet with
Realm Detective Mofteka at Holy City Ejarna to get a request to investigate the monster!

Fire Realm!

152828.en:
What is going on? It seems that
soldiers from Temple are guarding the
entrance with a tense atmosphere.

152829.en:
What is the liberator named
<pc> doing now? Salvation is
hard to come by.

152830.en:
The Order once gave me the name of a
liberator, but I can't remember what
it was called. Was it Dongebloza?

152833.en:
The priest of the Nadraga Order didn't tell me what kind of person the liberator is, so I tried to imagine it
in my own way. I bet the liberator is a slender 8 head tall with a nice body with a nice bonk. And she smiles with
a face like an angel.

152834.en:
You have business in the Great Temple? But we cannot let you into the Great Temple. Please don't make us do
anything to get rid of you by force.

152839.en:
After we heard that the liberator went to the Water Realm, we haven't heard anything about it at all. I wonder if
he might have died in the Water Realm.

153571.en:
I am PriestBesawaki, Estella's personal guard. I am usually at the Great Temple guarding Estella-sama's
room! But I was told that they were short on staff, so I'm here to help out at my family's inn. I'm in the
middle of cleaning, so I'd like you to leave!

If you want to go through with it, I
won't stop you.

154666.en:
I am PriestBesawaki, Estella's personal guard. Normally, I would be at the Great Temple guarding Estella-
sama's room! But I was told that they were short on staff, so I'm here on short notice to help out at my
parents' inn. I'm a bit of a brat! By the way, are you a houseguest? If so, why don't you stay in this room where
I made the beds myself?

Oh, my God! You say you don't like the
way I make your bed? This is an
unexpected response!

154668.en:
I see. You're staying the night, I see. Then you'd better get to sleep right away. I hope you have a good
dream!

I am PriestBesawaki, Estella's personal guard. I've been sent to help out at my parents' inn. I'm a bit
rough around the edges! If you are a guest, why don't you stay in this room where I personally made your bed?

Mmm. You're awake. My made-up bed must have been great. I'm sure you had a very good dream! What? I dreamt that I
spoke with Estella-sama. How enviable. Why can't I have that dream? I think my passionate love for Estella-sama
must have had some effect on this room!

154672.en:
Apparently, they're letting you stay
in this room for free. Would you like
to stay the night?<yesno><close>

154673.en:
Besawaki quickly left the room. lay down on the bed. Suddenly, he felt a tremendous urge to
sleep, and fell into a deep sleep.

154674.en:
Apparently, they're letting you stay
in this room for free. Would you like
to stay the night?<yesno><close>

154675.en:
woke up from a deep sleep. The dreams he had in his sleep remained in his memory as if they were
real.

160445.en:
The wards covering the Great Temple suddenly disappeared. What has become of the Nadraga cult?I am at a loss to
decide if I should stop you.

162815.en:
I am Priestess Besawaki, Estella's personal guard. I've been sent to help out at my parents' inn. I'm a bit
rough around the edges! By the way, there are unfounded rumors that Estella-sama has been excommunicated
or that the Great Temple has been closed! That can't be true. I'd like to go back there as soon as I'm done
helping my parents' innkeeper! By the way, if you are a guest, why don't you stay in this room where I personally
made the bed?

162816.en:
There is a wall of light at the entrance of the Great Temple. What on earth could have happened? I wonder if
this is the reason why the soldiers at the temple have been so tense.

162817.en:
At the entrance to the Great Temple. I see some kind of glowing wall. What is that? Are they preparing for some kind
of festival? I haven't heard anything about that.

162818.en:
I think Great Temple is more shiny
than Great Temple, but that's just my
imagination.

162819.en:
We have been notified that the Great Temple is closed to all outsiders. I will not allow you to pass. The
entrance to the temple has been warded, making it impossible for you to enter. Please leave us. But how
could Estella be excommunicated? I no longer understand what is happening to the Nadraga cult. Come to think of it,
I wonder what Estella's servants who are still at the inn are going to do now.

162821.en:
For reasons unknown, no one is allowed in the Great Temple of the Order of Nadraga anymore. I was planning to
come here to listen to your kind words, Mr. Orstov.

162822.en:
I kept forgetting the name of the liberator the Order once gave me, but I finally remembered it. Heropyogechi!
I think the name was something like this!
162822.ja:

162823.en:
I heard a rumor that all the realms are connected. But nothing has changed, has it? I thought that if all
the realms were connected, we would be saved!

162824.en:
We have heard that there is a new location where bazaar demand can be expected, and we have come here by any
means possible! We look forward to your continued patronage.

163178.en:
Look at this! The wards of the Great Temple, which used to prevent even priests from entering, have suddenly
disappeared. Is this the will of Lord Orstov that I may visit the temple to pray?

177878.en:
The survey is a simple task of selecting an area in the binder and defeating a specified number of
monsters inhabiting the area. I don't know how it works, but strangely enough, when you defeat a monster, the
information is recorded in the binder's memory area. So, when you finish defeating the monsters, please
bring the binder to me. I will collect the information and send it to the headquarters. It's really a wonder,
isn't it? Is this the mystery of Master Nadraga? Come to think of it, I heard that Nadraga-sama was an evil
god. Well, I don't think you need to worry about that! Of course, we will prepare the reward for you! So, good
day to you.

177879.en:
Mmmm you haha! You're a skilled adventurer, no matter how you look at it. And there's a certain air of
seriousness about you. My name is Mofteka, and I've just been assigned to the Nadraga cult's research
department to investigate the ecology of Nadragand monsters! Ah! It's now ''cooperative'', not ''Order''. But let's
leave the details aside. When it comes to investigating Monster, combat is a must. But as you can see, I am not
suited for fighting, no matter how you look at it. I was just short of passing the entrance exam for the
Order. That's why I was looking for someone who could help me with my mission here.

179661.en:
It's at the entrance to the Great Temple. I thought I saw a glowing wall, but now it's gone. Even the
priests are freaking out. What's going on?

179887.en:
Tobias disclosed to the people of Ejarna all the incidents that had taken place in the Nadraga cult.
Everyone was surprised and confused, but began to struggle to move forward.

179889.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Oh <pc>. I had faith that you
would do it!

179890.en:
I kept forgetting the name of the liberator the Order once gave me, but I finally remembered it. Heropyogechi!
It was something like this, I think! What? The real name is ? Hmmm, that's a rather common name. You
should change your name to Heropyogechi.

179891.en:
I'm glad I didn't catch you when the warning came to catch the liberator! You're lucky I wasn't stuck with a
separated leg!

179892.en:
I was ordered by the Patriarch to protect this place, but I had no idea it was connected to Astoltia! From now
on, I'll live my life seeing off those who cross over to Astoltia.

179893.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I was always saying, ''Someone save me!
But I guess such a spoiled mind has
given birth to the Nadraga cult.

179894.en:
I've decided to join the Nadragand Coalition! First, I'm going to bring ice from the Ice Realm and change this
shit environment with my own hands!

179895.en:
I heard that the liberator's name is , but I was not told what kind of person he is. He is probably a
nice guy with a strong physique and a kind smile! What? You are ? Hmmm. This is
different from what I expected, but that's evil Kunai.
179895.ja:

179896.en:
Tobias told me. Even an old man can be a liberator! I was told by Tobias that even an old man can be a liberator.
I'm really sorry for making such an old man like this feel like a liberator. I have no choice but to
take off my skin.

179897.en:
I had no idea that Patriarch Orstov was the source of all this. I've taken him for granted since I was a child,
so I still can't accept it.

The Nadraga Order has been reborn as the Nadragand Order, and the temple is now open to all! I will now take on
the role of welcoming you all, instead of being a watchman!

179899.en:
Tobias visited the houses one by one and talked to them. He said that from now on I should be a liberator to save
myself, my children, and others. I can't say anything but ''yes'' when he talks to me so passionately.

179900.en:
I heard that you saved us. So let me tell you something good. You're really hot from the dragon tribe's point of
view!

forward to it.
